legitimate: Allows read-only access to phone state, including the current cellular network information, the status of any ongoing calls, and a list of any PhoneAccounts registered on the device.
abuse: App may be using it to track device location, monitor calls, and gather other sensitive information

legitimate: Allows an application to send SMS messages.
abuse: App may be sending messages unknowingly for phishing or spam

legitimate: Allows an application to receive incoming SMS messages.
abuse: App may be receiving messages for phishing or spamming

legitimate: Allows an application to read currnt existing SMS messages.
abuse: App may be reading sensitive messages such as verification codes

legitimate: (Obsolete, removed in API level 23) Allows an application to write SMS messages.
abuse: App may be sending messages unknowingly for phishing or spam

legitimate: Allows an application to record audio.
abuse: App may be recording audio without user consent

legitimate: Allows applications to access information about networks.
abuse: App may be checking if the device is connected to a network, which can be used to monitor network activity or data exfiltration

legitimate: Allows applications to open network sockets.
abuse: App may be communicating with a remote server

legitimate: Allows an application to receive the Intent.ACTION_BOOT_COMPLETED that is broadcast after the system finishes booting.
abuse: App may launch itself after the device boots to ensure persistence

legitimate: Allows an app to access precise location.
abuse: App may be tracking the user's location

legitimate: Allows an application to read the user's contacts data.
abuse: App may be reading contacts for phishing or spamming

legitimate: Allows an application to write to external storage.
abuse: App may be writing data to external storage for data theft or manipulation

legitimate: Required to be able to access the camera device.
abuse: App may be taking pictures without user consent

legitimate: Allows an application to read the user's calendar data.
abuse: App may be reading calendar events which may contain sensitive information

legitimate: Allows an application to write the user's calendar data.
abuse: App may be writing calendar events for malicious purposes

legitimate: Allows an application to initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call.
abuse: App may be initiating phone calls without user consent

legitimate: Allows an app to create windows using the type TYPE_APPLICATION_OVERLAY, shown on top of all other apps.
abuse: App may be displaying overlay windows to trick users into clicking on malicious content

legitimate: Required by an AccessibilityService, to allow for interacting with the user and to access UI elements.
abuse: App may be using accessibility services to monitor user activity

legitimate: Allows an application to query any package installed on the device.
abuse: App may be querying installed packages for malicious purposes

legitimate: Allows applications to connect to paired bluetooth devices.
abuse: App may be connecting to bluetooth devices for data exfiltration

legitimate: Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service.
abuse: App may be accessing accounts for phishing, spamming, or unauthorised access

legitimate: Allows an application to manage the list of accounts in the AccountManager.
abuse: App may be managing accounts for phishing, spamming, or unauthorised access

legitimate: Allows applications to access information about Wi-Fi networks.
abuse: App may be checking if the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network, which can be used to monitor network activity or data exfiltration

legitimate: Allows an application to read or write the system settings.
abuse: App may be changing system settings to disable security features or enable malicious features

legitimate: Allows an application to call an ActivityManager method to kill background processes.
abuse: App may be killing background processes to disable security features

legitimate: Allows an application to read from external storage.
abuse: App may be reading data from external storage for data theft or manipulation
